nodes.text: Put Up Your Dukes is a mini adventure for use in any era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Jeff Quick and published on November 7, 2002.

The adventure follows the events of Steal of a Deal and brings the heroes into a dangerous part of a port town where they get pulled into a back room to engage in a few rounds of barehanded fighting and seedy exchanges with the locals. Meanwhile, another enemy lurks within the crowd.
"Put Up Your Dukes" is intended for four player characters of 6th or 7th level.
